item.description:
Yahoo its Friday night, lets have some fun and PARTY!!!  We know how to have fun and make peeps feel very welcome. If you want to eat just put it in your RSVP, wanna make sure I get a seat for your butt . See you there!!!! This is a nice place a little small but cozy!!!!

 Bands are great here, dance floor is a little tight but we love closeness,lol!!! plenty of pakring space as well, if the lot is full park across the street at the church parking lot.  You are responsible for your own tabs, they will do seperate checks Yahoo!!! the food is great. Come early if you want to eat and get a seat.

OH Yes and  lets prepare by toasting to the New Year in a fun low keyed no frilly dresses etc atmosphere. Good old fashion jeans night out with no cover charge.

 

 

Band : River City Band (Great Entertainment Band)

Time   9PM-1am

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dancing at Palmers Or Yes Toasting the Pre NYear
